statements: SELECT * FROM violations_table
SELECT violation_type, violation_date FROM violations_table WHERE violation_id = 123
SELECT violation_description FROM violations_table WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM violations_table WHERE penalty_amount > 100
SELECT violation_type, penalty_amount FROM violations_table ORDER BY penalty_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM violations_table WHERE violation_type='Speeding' ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, penalty_amount FROM violations_table WHERE violation_date >= '2021-01-01' AND violation_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY penalty_amount ASC;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_date, penalty_amount FROM violations_table WHERE violation_type LIKE '%Traffic%' ORDER BY violation_date ASC, penalty_amount DESC;
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM violations_table GROUP BY violation_type HAVING total_violations > 1 ORDER BY total_violations DESC;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_description FROM violations_table WHERE violation_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY violation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM violations;
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM violations WHERE fine_amount > 100;
SELECT violation_id, violation_description, fine_amount FROM violations WHERE violation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM penalties ORDER BY penalty_amount DESC;
SELECT violation_id, MAX(penalty_amount) AS max_penalty FROM penalties GROUP BY violation_id;
SELECT DISTINCT violation_id, violation_description FROM violations WHERE violation_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT penalty_description, penalty_amount FROM penalties INNER JOIN violations ON penalties.violation_id = violations.violation_id WHERE fines_amount > 100
SELECT COUNT(violation_id) AS total_violations FROM violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT violation_id, penalty_description, penalty_amount FROM penalties LEFT JOIN violations ON penalties.violation_id = violations.violation_id WHERE fine_amount >= 50
SELECT MIN(fine_amount) AS min_fine, MAX(fine_amount) AS max_fine FROM violations
SELECT * FROM Violations;
SELECT violation_type, location_id, violation_date FROM Violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT violation_type, penalty_amount FROM Violations JOIN Penalties ON Violations.violation_id = Penalties.violation_id WHERE penalty_type = 'Fine';
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM Locations ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM Violations JOIN Locations ON Violations.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE Violations.violation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Locations.location_name, Locations.city, Penalties.penalty_type FROM Locations JOIN Penalties ON Locations.location_id = Penalties.violation_id WHERE Penalties.penalty_amount > 1000;
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM Violations GROUP BY violation_type ORDER BY total_violations DESC;

SELECT Locations.city, Locations.state, AVG(Penalties.penalty_amount) AS avg_penalty FROM Locations JOIN Penalties ON Locations.location_id = Penalties.violation_id GROUP BY Locations.city, Locations.state HAVING avg_penalty > 500;
SELECT Locations.location_name, Locations.address, Penalties.penalty_date FROM Locations JOIN Penalties ON Locations.location_id = Penalties.violation_id ORDER BY Penalties.penalty_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM violations WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT violation_date, penalty_amount FROM violations WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT SUM(penalty_amount) AS total_penalties FROM violations;
SELECT violations.*, regulations.regulation_name FROM violations JOIN regulations ON violations.regulation_id = regulations.regulation_id;
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_department FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM violations;
SELECT violation_id, location, regulation_id FROM violations WHERE penalty_amount > 1000;
SELECT penalty_id, penalty_date, fine_amount, violation_date FROM penalties ORDER BY penalty_date DESC;

SELECT inspectors.inspector_name, violations.location, penalties.fine_amount FROM inspectors INNER JOIN penalties ON inspectors.inspector_id = penalties.inspector_id INNER JOIN violations ON penalties.violation_id = violations.violation_id;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id IN (SELECT regulation_id FROM violations);
SELECT * FROM violations;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date, penalty_amount FROM violations WHERE violation_type = 'Safety';
SELECT company_name, penalty_amount FROM violations JOIN companies ON violations.company_name = companies.company_name;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspectors ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE founding_date < '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY founding_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT company_name, headquarters_location, COUNT(inspector_id) AS num_inspections FROM companies JOIN inspections ON companies.company_id = inspections.company_id GROUP BY company_name, headquarters_location ORDER BY num_inspections DESC;

SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, company_inspected, violations.violation_type FROM inspectors JOIN inspections ON inspectors.inspector_id = inspections.inspector_id JOIN violations ON inspections.company_id = violations.violation_id WHERE violations.penalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY inspection_date ASC, violations.violation_date DESC;

SELECT companies.company_name, penalties.penalty_type, penalties.penalty_amount FROM companies JOIN violations ON companies.company_name = violations.company_name JOIN penalties ON violations.violation_id = penalties.violation_id WHERE penalties.penalty_amount > 5000 ORDER BY penalties.penalty_amount DESC;

SELECT inspector_name, inspector_license, COUNT() AS num_penalties FROM inspectors JOIN penalties ON inspectors.inspector_id = penalties.inspector_id GROUP BY inspector_name, inspector_license HAVING num_penalties > 2 ORDER BY num_penalties DESC;
